data.eml:eml: A new genus and six new species of the tropical Camptotypus genus­group (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae, Pimplinae) from northern South America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sääksjärvi, Ilari E., Palacio, Edgard, Gauld, Ian D., Jussila, Reijo, Salo, Jukka (2003): A new genus and six new species of the tropical Camptotypus genus­group (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae, Pimplinae) from northern South America. Zootaxa 197: 1-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156248
